name: Theo
title: Knight of Loyalty

uniqueWeapon.name: Lightning Bolt, Legios
effect: Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 300, Crit DMG is increased by 100%, and Penetration is increased by 300. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

skillInfo.name: Final Crash
skillInfo.description: Attacks 16 times, dealing a total of ??? M.DMG to enemies in range. Upon each Crit Hit, Crit DMG is increased by 3% for 10 sec, and there is a 30% chance to deal ??? extra M.DMG, inflicting stun for 0.3 sec. Crit DMG boost can be stacked up to 30 times max.

skills.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.

background.story: A knight who served the Republic of Gray 100 years ago, and an admirer of Jane Gray. Theo was the First Knight of the Republic and the wielder of the Lightning Legios. During the Duchy's battle against the Demon Army, the Mountain Fortress went on a rampage when its seal was lifted. Under Jane's order, Theo set out to contain it. In his absence, powerful Demon officers attacked the royal palace. Theo returned to fight them despite heavy injury, but was unable to defeat them by himself. When the battle was over, he held the body of the princess in his arms and cried out from the ruins of the palace. Suddenly, a mysterious entity offered him a chance to defend his princess for all eternity. When he accepted, he fell into a deep slumber.

itemIntroductions.weapon: A spear said to have been forged from a bolt of lightning. Electricity constantly flows around this impressive spear that stands as tall as an average adult male. Forging a spear from lightning was a tremendous task. But then again, Jin was no ordinary blacksmith. He smelted a huge mana stone infused with a red dragon's blood. He used this to contain the lightning before forging it into a spear. Aside from its chosen master, no person can touch this weapon. When its two pieces are combined, it lets out a tremendous flux of energy that resembles a dragon's roar.
treasures: A decoration that functions as a charm and is made with the fur of Sereblos, the holy sable. Legios's electric signals can push the body to its limit, but it is also physically taxing. The sable's lustrous fur absorbs the kickback, significantly reducing the burden on Theo's body. Sereblos's fur works as a conductor that conveys Legios's electric signals to the entire body while protecting Theo's veins with holy energy, allowing him to fight without damaging his body.

Called a thunderbolt from the sky. Legios is also called a holy beast. The power of Legios was so strong that when they made it into a weapon, the Republic of Gray couldn't contain all of its power. So the greatest piece was put in the Spear of Lightning, and the remaining pieces were put into different places. One of those pieces was put into God of Lightning's Necklace. It is said that anyone with this necklace can commune with the Spear of Lightning and get closer to the power of Legios.

Legacy of the fallen Republic of Gray. A treasure that a respected palace wizard of the Republic of Gray gave to the 1st Knight Theo, who received the Lightning Bolt Legios. The Lightning Essence that has the energy of the Lightning Bolt maximizes the effect of Lightning Explosion.

A funeral doll that Theo asked May to make. He put the doll that looks exactly like him where the tombstone of his eternal love once rested. Even when time flows again and he returns back to soil, he would still be by her side.
